text: Andrew Harper (1844-1936) was a Scottish–Australian biblical scholar, teacher, and school principal. Andrew Harper may also refer to: * Andrew Harper, pseudonym of Douglas Clegg (born 1958), American horror and dark fantasy author * Andrew John Harper (born 1971), Australian fraudster * Andy Harper (born 1967), Australian soccer player * Killing of Andrew Harper, the death of a British police officer in the line of duty
title: Andrew Harper (disambiguation)
